subject: Way to track order?
description_text:
I ordered the 3 haptics with the power box that goes with it from the
website but i guess my email that the confirmation would’ve been sent to
was full it’s my old email that’s attached to my PayPal. Is there a way to
get tracking info from you guys if i provided information about the order?
It was placed the 24th of November at night and it was placed under the
name “George Lee”  with the email “official8thentitymusic@gmail.com” and is
being shipped to “11621 sunset knolls road, Lakeside, CA, 92040”

Thanks so much if you are able to provide any tracking/shipping
information, happy holidays!
-- 

*1x Grammy Award Winning Producer*
*Contact: *
*  Phone:* *(619)-733- <619%29-988-2716>1398*
*  Email: georgedavidlee@gmail.com <officialskitzobeatz@gmail.com>*
  *Instagram: @dontbeangrywithgeorge*

*Production credit must be issued to "Curious George" - (BMI)*

   *This e-mail and any files or data transmitted with it are confidential
and intended solely for the use of the individual named above. If you have
received this email in error and are not the intended recipient, please
notify the sender by e-mail and immediately delete the message and all
materials without reading them.  If you are not the intended recipient,
copying, forwarding or otherwise disseminating or distributing this
information is prohibited.*

conversations.body_text: Hi Curious George,    We have updated your email address and sent you a shipping notification.
